text: The Reform Party (RP; , ) is a South Korean political party led by Lee Jun- seok, the former leader of the People Power Party (PPP). While it was founded by Lee Jun-seok as a conservative party after his split from the PPP, it later merged with other parties and factions led by politicians formerly members of the Democratic Party of Korea (DPK) and Justice Party. ==References== Category:Political parties in South Korea
title: Reform Party (South Korea)
